Summary: dark triangle approx 300 ft overhead & silent
divs: Sighting DetailsOmg! I can't believe whatever the hell that was but I'm telling you it was real! A black traingle came from the se moving slowly. Went outside because dog was crying, wimpering. All of a sudden things got really quiet, all nocturnal sounds quit, crickets frogs you name it they all stopped! When I looked up I noticed stars disapeared but was because the black shaped triangle shaped thing blocked out stars I went inside to get camera. My lights went out I had to use a cig lighter to find camera I got 1 pic but not to good because it was dark. How freakin strange. I went back outside just a few mins ago because I heard loud noise & 2 helicopters just flew by heading same direction.
